input: Consider the following statements: P. The writ of mandamus is available not only against judicial authorities but also against administrative authorities. Q. The writ of prohibition is issued only against judicial or quasi- judicial authorities. Which of the statements given above is/are correct ?
explanation: Mandamu for “we order,” a writ (more modernly called a “writ of mandate”) which orders a public agency or governmental body to perform an act required by law when it has neglected or refused to do so. A writ of prohibition is a writ directing a subordinate to stop doing something the law prohibits.
